name: Stronghold: Crusader
description:
Stronghold: Crusader is a strategy game developed by FireFly Studios. It came out on 27-09-2002. It was published by Gathering of Developers. On review aggregator Metacritic, Stronghold: Crusader has a score of 78. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Stronghold: Crusader on PC.
